overview: SST admits students through the Direct School Admission (DSA) exercise. Students who are passionate about science and technology and demonstrate aptitude for applied learning are encouraged to apply.
eligibility: Primary 6 students who are Singapore Citizens or Permanent Residents studying in mainstream primary schools.

dsaProcess.description: The DSA-Sec exercise allows students to seek admission to SST based on their talents and achievements before the PSLE results are released.

steps.title: Online Application
steps.description: Submit your application through the MOE DSA-Sec portal during the application period (typically May).

steps.title: Selection Test
steps.description: Shortlisted applicants will be invited for a selection process that includes aptitude tests and activities.

steps.title: Interview
steps.description: Shortlisted candidates will attend an interview to assess their passion and suitability for SST's programmes.

steps.title: Offer
steps.description: Successful applicants will receive a Confirmed Offer (CO) or placed on the Waiting List (WL).

steps.title: Acceptance
steps.description: Students who receive offers exercise their School Preference through the DSA-Sec portal.

importantDates.note: Please visit www.sst.edu.sg for the latest admissions dates and details.

schoolFees.note: As a government-aided independent school, SST charges school fees that are different from mainstream government schools. Financial assistance is available for eligible students.
schoolFees.financialAssistance: Students from lower-income families can apply for the MOE Financial Assistance Scheme (FAS) or SST's own financial aid programmes.
